MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK10  postcode area of Alloa. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:35pm to remove generators from the network and complete a final repair to the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:35pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05pm  on the 28th of April 2021
